All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ConsoleColour
 
Menu
This class is used for menu related things such as: the menu for the user -(1) Specify a text file for analysis, -(2) Specify a path for a text resource to analyze for example tweets aka twitter url(not literally a url in this case), -(3)Save the output to a specified file, -(4) Enter lexicon file path that will be used, -(5) Display the results of the lexicon comparison to the resource and output the result to the file if the user has specified the output file location, -(6) quit
OutputResultsToFile
This class is only for writing all the necessary details to a file
ProcessSentimentVT
Sentiment Analysis done here using the thread safe concurrent resources and virtual threads
Runner
This class is for the execution for this program
